ovdesc.p: This is a 'FIN'ancial level file which holds the financial information of each REPO counterparty and is keyed by T24 customer number.
At the moment, it stores the initial margin amounts for both repo and reverse repo contracts.

desc.p: This field holds the initial margin amount used in Reverse REPO contracts.
Fields RESO.IM.CCY to RESO.IM.AMT form a related multi value set.
Standard T24 amount field. (1 to 19 characters).
This field specifies the currency of initial margin used in Reverse REPO contracts. Fields RESO.IM.CCY to RESO.IM.AMT form a related multi value set. Standard T24 currency field.
A maximum of 3 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the CURRENCY file.
This is the key to the CUSTOMER.REPO file.
A maximum of 10 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the CUSTOMER file.
This field holds the initial margin amount used in REPO contracts.
Fields REPO.IM.CCY to REPO.IM.AMT form a related multi value set.
Standard T24 amount field. (1 to 19 characters).
This field specifies the currency of initial margin used in REPO contracts. Fields REPO.IM.CCY to REPO.IM.AMT form a related multi value set. Standard T24 currency field.
A maximum of 3 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the CURRENCY file.
